title: Ravenborn Leblanc fan art
body: I feel sad when I see all the pretty colors on other people's fan art and mine's just pencil and paper... TT~TT If you're wondering where the other arm is, it's down by her side. I didn't aim to draw it exactly like the splash; I put my own spin on it. Enjoy!

replies.body: You shouldn't feel sad! I think pencil artwork has its own beauty to it~ Nice art!
This is beautiful! I'm actually a big fan of black and white artwork! ^-^

Nicely done! I really like the shadowing.
Ps. I can't color too, so don't worry you are not alone XD

you sure you drew this?
I think I saw this somewhere else before.
Also the eyes are too big
I remember this because thats what I said when I saw that picture before.

This is my own art, no worries. I posted this in the wrong section before, maybe that's where you saw it :O As I said, I put my own spin on it (enlarged eyes, lashes, folds of clothing, etc.). Not every single detail is the same as Riot's splash.
